articles.title: 'Please get your second shot,' top US health official urges as Delta variant remains a pressing threat - CNN Philippines
articles.description: America is in a far better place now than it was six months ago in its fight against the coronavirus pandemic, with overall cases and deaths down, according to the latest data.
articles.content:
(CNN) -- America is in a far better place now than it was six months ago in its fight against the coronavirus pandemic, with overall cases and deaths down, according to the latest data.
